sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"意识到的"之意。
means: aware ：强调通过耳闻目睹或感觉而得到的信息，也指敏税的观察和推断。侧重感知，多与of一起用。
conscious ：指内心的感觉，强调深刻的心理活动。
sensible ：侧重通过直觉或理性感觉意识到某物的存在。

sentence.Network_en: He became more aware of the things that started that tension off.
sentence.Network_cn: 他越来越清楚地认识到引起紧张局势的原因。

sentence.Network_en: He must have been aware that my parents' marriage was breaking up.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一定已经知道我父母的婚姻即将破裂。

sentence.Network_en: Sometimes we are not consciously aware of these feelings.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时候我们没有意识到这些情感。

第一，假如法院对权重问题一点不干预的话，行政机关对相关因素的考虑，很可能会变成只是意识到（aware）某种相关因素的存在，或者说，只是形式上考虑，但却根本没有给予任何的权重，没有给予实质性考虑。[24].

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  gewær, of West Germanic origin; related to German gewahr, also to ware

encyclopedia.content: aware英音：[ə'wɛə]美音：[ə'wɛr] 形容词 a. 1. 知道的，察觉的[F][(+of)][+that][+wh-] I am well aware that this is a tough job. 我深知这是一件棘手的工作。 She was not aware of having done wrong. 她没有意识到做错了事。 2. 锛堄敫贝柿蔑級有。..方面知识锛埢蛞馐讹級的 He is an artistically aware young man. 他是个懂艺术的青年。 3. 明智的；懂世故的；阅历深的以

entry.def: If you are aware of something, you know about it.

example.ex: Smokers are well aware of the dangers to their own health...
example.tran: 吸烟的人都知道吸烟对自身健康的危害。

example.ex: He should have been aware of what his junior officers were doing...
example.tran: 他本应该清楚自己下级们的所作所为。

entry.tran: 注意到的；察觉到的；意识到的
entry.def: If you are aware of something, you realize that it is present or is happening because you hear it, see it, smell it, or feel it.

example.ex: She was acutely aware of the noise of the city...
Jane was suddenly aware that she was digging her nails into her thigh.
example.tran: 简突然间意识到她正在用指甲抠大腿。

entry.def: Someone who is aware notices what is happening around them or happening in the place where they live.

means.word_mean: 1. (sometimes followed by `of') having or showing realization or perception;

sentences.sentence: "aware that he had exceeded the speed limit"
"mindful of these criticisms, I shall attempt to justify my action"

means.word_mean: 4. (usually followed by `of') having knowledge or understanding;

sentences.sentence: "our youth are cognizant of the law"
"I am well aware of his limitations"
"the most...technically aware of the novelists under thirty"- W.S.Graham
"surprisingly knowledgeable about what was going on"

auth_sentence.content: Bond is a caring, socially aware love man.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bond is a caring, socially aware love man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bond is a caring, socially aware love man.

auth_sentence.content: We weren't aware of the DNR until then.
auth_sentence.res_content: We weren't aware of the DNR until then.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We weren't aware of the DNR until then.

auth_sentence.content: BBC Workplace is aware of the Royal Mail site.
auth_sentence.res_content: BBC Workplace is aware of the Royal Mail site.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未认识到的,未察觉到的,不知道的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un没有,未+aware[adj.意识到的]→adj.未认识到的,未察觉到的,不知道的
aware[adj.意识到的]+ness状态→n.知道, 晓得

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 加在单词前,表示"在……,……的"; 2. 注:加在描述性的动词前面表形容词,常用作表语;加在名词,形容词前构成副词.

stems_affixes.word_buile: a在……,……的+shore岸→adv.向岸地, 在岸上地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 在远处, 到远处, 离去
stems_affixes.word_buile: a在……,……的+way路→沿着路去了远方

Sentence.sentence: Kodak is an example of a firm that was very much aware that they had to adapt, and spent a lot of money trying to do so, but ultimately failed.
We conform ( 遵守) to norms so readily that we are hardly aware they exist.
When we visit another society whose norms are different, we quickly become aware that things we do this way, they do that way
I became aware of the trials of career-focused European woman a few years ago when I met a post-doctoral student from Germany who was then a visiting fellow at Johns Hopkins.
If the employees were already aware of their deficiencies before the evaluation period, however, they may be unable or unwilling to correct them.
She worked at a radio station for a year, always aware that her body was degenerating.

means.word_mean: 意识到的, 知道的，明白的

sentences.en: He doesn't seem to be aware of the problems.
sentences.cn: 他好像没有意识到这个问题。

sentences.en: Are you aware that there is a difficulty?

jushi.english: The charity aims to create a new generation of environmentally aware consumers and producers.
jushi.chinese: 这个慈善团体力图培养具有环保意识的新一代消费者和制造商。
